servinfosub.title: Vehicle equipped with headlight auto leveling system

s1.ptxt: Make sure all couplers of headlight and leveling actuator are connected securely.
Park vehicle in front of blank wall (screen).
Turn ignition switch to ON position.
Perform Headlight Leveling Warning Light Check .
Connect service wire (2) to terminals of diagnosis connector (1).
Perform Steps a) through c) described below within 20 seconds after Step 5).

s2.ptxt: Turn lighting switch (3) to “HEAD” position and then turn lighting switch to OFF position.

s1.ptxt: Check that optical axes of headlights reflected on blank wall (screen) change. If not, go to Headlight Auto Leveling System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped) .

servinfosub.title: Vehicle equipped with manual leveling headlight system

s1.ptxt: Make sure all couplers of headlight and leveling actuator are connected securely.
Park vehicle in front of blank wall (screen).
Turn ignition switch to ON position.

Move headlight leveling switch and check that optical axes of headlights reflected on blank wall (screen) change then.Also check that leveling actuator sounds slightly while moving leveling switch. If optical axes do not change, go to Headlight Manual Leveling System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped) .
